title: (x) Can anyone tell me what font is that? / light italics w/ ball terminals - H&FJ Archer {Jan}
content:
Can anyone tell me what font they used for "art in my coffee" logo as well as below text "collection ..."  
 [http://artinmycoffee.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327090649/http:/artinmycoffee.com/ "http://artinmycoffee.com/")

Many thanks
author: meyson
